# OBJECT::ALLOW_PICKUP_ARROW_MARKER_WHEN_UNCOLLECTABLE

## Summary
Allows the arrow marker to be displayed when the pickup is uncollectable

## Parameters
* **OBJECT_INDEX** pickupID
* **BOOL** set = true
